Text: so whats this a screener? DVD release date : 23 May 2011. Having been a teenager in Glasgow at the same time as the film is set i can recognise everything in it right down to the Crombie coats and Harrington jackets. We used to sing "bovver boots and bovver braces, we're the boys that slash yer faces" Tollboys Ya Bass!....  Peter Mullen socialises in a pub quite near me and is a really down tae earth bloke Try to see his movie "Orphans" http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0119842/
